components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description:
A school building with multiple storeys, and a clock on the front. A place that children or teenagers attend for their education.

This emoji tends to spike in use in September when many Northern Hemisphere countries' schools reopen after their summer holidays.

Previously displayed on Windows as a collection of school-related items: an apple, ruler, and pencil.
components.title: School

description: A woman standing in front of a chalkboard (aka blackboard) with the intention of teaching a class. Often shown holding a üìï Closed Book or a pointer.
title: Woman Teacher

emoji_net_data.definition: A woman standing in front of a chalkboard (aka blackboard) with the intention of teaching a class. See also:¬†?????¬†Male Teacher The Woman Te http://emojipedia.org/female-teacher/
emoji_net_data.name: woman teacher

bn:00046958n: A person who, or a thing which, educates
A person who educates, esp. a teacher, principal, or other person involved in planning or directing education.
Person who, or a thing which, educates.
A person whose occupation is teaching
A person who teaches a specific skill to another person.
Person who provides education for pupils (children) and students (adults)
A person who is responsible for teaching a class.
People who provide schooling for pupils and students
Teachers or schoolteachers are people who provide education for pupils and students.
A teacher is a person who provides education for students.

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00064601n: Someone who is a member of the faculty at a college or university
A professor is a scholarly teacher; the precise meaning of the term varies by country.
A entry-level position in a university faculty, lower than a full professor.
A teacher or faculty member at a college or university.
